title: Azure AI Services for Project Managers (Contoso Recommended)
format: Online, Self-Paced Learning Path with Hands-on Labs
company_relevance: Strategic platform for Contoso; Aligns with AI-900 certification goal

content.course_description: This learning path, curated by Contoso Cloud Guild using Microsoft Learn resources, provides project managers with a practical understanding of key Azure AI services relevant to Contoso projects. It focuses on service capabilities, common use cases, integration points, and considerations for project planning and execution.
learning_objectives: Identify core Azure AI services (Azure Machine Learning, Azure OpenAI Service, Cognitive Services, Azure Bot Service).
Understand the typical use cases and benefits of each service within a business context.
Learn basic concepts for provisioning and managing Azure AI resources.
Understand cost implications and monitoring options for Azure AI services.
Recognize integration patterns between different Azure services (e.g., Data Factory, Synapse Analytics, App Service).
Prepare for the AI-900 Azure AI Fundamentals certification exam.

modules.title: Azure Cognitive Services
topics: Language Services (Sentiment Analysis, Key Phrase Extraction)

target_audience: Business Analysts involved in AI projects
prerequisites: Basic understanding of cloud computing concepts
